This week, my colleagues [Kateřina Škardová](https://m3disim.saclay.inria.fr/people/katerina-skardova) and [Martin Genet](https://mgenet.github.io/), and I attended the [2024 VPH](https://vph-conference.org/) conference. [Kateřina Škardová](https://m3disim.saclay.inria.fr/people/katerina-skardova) and I both presented our [ongoing research work](https://alexandredabyseesaram.github.io/research.html#work-in-progress) towards getting a real-time digital twin of the lungs.

 Meanwhile [Martin Genet](https://mgenet.github.io/) presented the latest progress of the poro-mechanics lung model developed in the team.
